plot: Lalbaug Parel was released on 23 April, 2010. Produced by Arun Rangachari & directed by Mahesh Manjrekar. Movie highlights the atrocities towards the mill workers, totally ignored by the Government and its consequences.
title: Lalbaug Parel
plot_es: Lalbaug Parel was released on 23 April, 2010. Produced by Arun Rangachari & directed by Mahesh Manjrekar. Movie highlights the atrocities towards the mill workers, totally ignored by the Government and its consequences.
